emerging_technologies.name: AI-driven Smart Contracts
emerging_technologies.description: Smart contracts that can autonomously modify terms based on AI analysis of external data.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduces human error and increases contract efficiency, potentially reducing legal disputes.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Legal acceptance, standardization, and integration with existing systems.

emerging_technologies.name: Decentralized Space Operations
emerging_technologies.description: A decentralized network for managing space missions, resource allocation, and data sharing.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Democratizes space exploration and could foster international cooperation.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory hurdles, technological feasibility, and international agreements.

emerging_technologies.name: Tokenized Energy Markets
emerging_technologies.description: Markets where energy units are tokenized, enabling direct peer-to-peer energy trading.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Promotes renewable energy use, reduces reliance on centralized power grids.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Energy policy changes, consumer awareness, and infrastructure readiness.

emerging_technologies.name: Decentralized Autonomous Transport Networks
emerging_technologies.description: A network where autonomous vehicles manage their routing and operations via blockchain consensus.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Potential reduction in urban congestion, enhanced privacy in travel data.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Regulatory frameworks, public trust in autonomous systems, and tech maturity.

mainstream_technologies.name: Zero-Knowledge Applications
mainstream_technologies.description: Applications using zero-knowledge proofs for privacy and security.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widely adopted in finance, healthcare, and government for data privacy.

mainstream_technologies.name: Cross-Chain Innovations
mainstream_technologies.description: Technologies enabling seamless interaction between different blockchain networks.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becoming standard for blockchain interoperability in various sectors.

epoch_themes.description: Shift towards systems that are managed by decentralized consensus mechanisms.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Promotes resilience, reduces single points of failure, and fosters innovation through community governance.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Rise in blockchain governance models, increased focus on data sovereignty, and a push for transparent systems.

epoch_themes.description: Integration of green technology with economic incentives through tokenization.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Encourages environmentally friendly behaviors through economic benefits.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Increased environmental consciousness, regulatory push for sustainable practices, and technological advancements in renewable energy.
